response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. For this opportunity, I am proposing a price of $12,000. This investment is expected to provide substantial returns and benefits that align with your goals. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 12000}
